children.text: Okay, I need to translate these three Java programs into a single Fortran program that does the same thing as running them in sequence.

children.text: First, the first Java program (codeforces_621_A) reads an integer n followed by n long integers.
children.label: high_level_plan

children.text: It separates the odd numbers, sorts them, sums all even numbers and the sorted odds except possibly the smallest if there's an odd count. The output is this sum.
children.label: high_level_plan

children.text: The second program (atcoder_ABC169_D) takes the sum from the first as input, then calculates some mathematical value based on prime factors. It outputs that answer.
children.label: high_level_plan

children.text: The third program (atcoder_ABC124_C) takes the second's output (a number) and processes it as a string, counting the minimal changes needed to make adjacent characters different.

So the chain is: input -> first program's output (sum) -> second program's input, then second's output (another number) -> third's input as a string, then third's output is the final result.

program main

   implicit none

   integer :: n, a1, a2, answer2, num_odds, i, j, count, sqrt_n, temp_i

   integer(8) :: sum1, n_second, temp

   integer(8), allocatable :: list(:), odds(:)

   character(len=20) :: str_second, string_a, string_b

   !
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
Read input

   read*, n

   allocate(list(n)) read*, list

   ! Process first part

   sum1 = 0

   allocate(odds(n)) ! maximum possible odds is n

   num_odds =0

   do i=1, n

      if (mod(list(i),2) ==1) then

         num_odds = num_odds +1

         odds(num_odds) = list(i)

      else

         sum1 = sum1 + list(i)

      end if

   end do

   ! Sort odds

   call sort(odds(1:num_odds))

   sum1 = sum1 + sum(odds(1:num_odds)) if (mod(num_odds,2) ==1) then

      sum1 = sum1 - odds(1)

   end if

   ! Process second part

   n_second = sum1

   answer2 =0

   temp = n_second

   sqrt_n = int(sqrt(real(temp)))

   do i=2, sqrt_n

      count =0

      temp_i = temp

      do while (mod(temp_i, i) ==0)

         temp_i = temp_i /i

         count = count +1

      end do

      if (count >0) then

         temp = temp_i

         current_count = count

         j=1

         do while (current_count >=j)

            current_count = current_count -j

            answer2 = answer2 +1

            j = j+1

         end do

      end if

   end do

   ! Check remaining temp

   if (temp >1) then

      answer2 = answer2 +1

   end if

   ! Process third part

   write(str_second, '(i0)') answer2

   str_second = adjustl(str_second)

   string_a = str_second

   a1 =0

   do i=2, len_trim(str_second)

      if (string_a(i:i) == string_a(i-1:i-1)) then

         if (string_a(i:i) == '1') then

            string_a(i:i) = '0'

         else

            string_a(i:i) = '1'

         end if

         a1 = a1 +1

      end if

   end do

   string_b = str_second

   a2 =0

   do i = len_trim(str_second), 2, -1 if (string_b(i:i) == string_b(i-1:i-1)) then

         if (string_b(i-1:i-1) == '1') then

            string_b(i-1:i-1) = '0'

         else

            string_b(i-1:i-1) = '1'

         end if

         a2 = a2 +1

      end if

   end do

   print*, min(a1, a2)

   deallocate(list, odds)

end program main

program main

   implicit none

   integer :: n, a1, a2, answer2, num_odds, i, j, count, sqrt_n, temp_i, current_count

   integer(8) :: sum1, n_second, temp, temp_swap

   integer(8), allocatable :: list(:), odds(:)

   character(len=20) :: str_second, string_a, string_b

   !
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
Read input

   read*, n

   allocate(list(n)) read*, list

   ! Process first part

   sum1 = 0

   allocate(odds(n)) ! maximum possible odds is n

   num_odds =0

   do i=1, n

      if (mod(list(i),2) ==1) then

         num_odds = num_odds +1

         odds(num_odds) = list(i)

      else

         sum1 = sum1 + list(i)

      end if

   end do

   ! Sort odds using bubble sort

   do i =1, num_odds-1

      do j =i+1, num_odds

         if (odds(i) > odds(j)) then

            temp_swap = odds(i)

            odds(i) = odds(j)

            odds(j) = temp_swap

         end if

      end do

   end do

   sum1 = sum1 + sum(odds(1:num_odds)) if (mod(num_odds,2) ==1) then

      sum1 = sum1 - odds(1)

   end if

   ! Process second part

   n_second = sum1

   answer2 =0

   temp = n_second

   sqrt_n = int(sqrt(real(temp)))

   do i=2, sqrt_n

      count =0

      temp_i = temp

      do while (mod(temp_i, i) ==0)

         temp_i = temp_i /i

         count = count +1

      end do

      temp = temp_i

      if (count >0) then

         current_count = count

         j=1

         do while (current_count >=j)

            current_count = current_count -j

            answer2 = answer2 +1

            j = j+1

         end do

      end if

   end do

   ! Check remaining temp

   if (temp >1) then

      answer2 = answer2 +1

   end if

   ! Process third part

   write(str_second, '(i0)') answer2

   str_second = adjustl(str_second)

   string_a = str_second

   a1 =0

   do i=2, len_trim(str_second)

      if (string_a(i:i) == string_a(i-1:i-1)) then

         if (string_a(i:i) == '1') then

            string_a(i:i) = '0'

         else

            string_a(i:i) = '1'

         end if

         a1 = a1 +1

      end if

   end do

   string_b = str_second

   a2 =0

   do i = len_trim(str_second), 2, -1 if (string_b(i:i) == string_b(i-1:i-1)) then

         if (string_b(i-1:i-1) == '1') then

            string_b(i-1:i-1) = '0'

         else

            string_b(i-1:i-1) = '1'

         end if

         a2 = a2 +1

      end if

   end do

   print*, min(a1, a2)

   deallocate(list, odds)

end program main

program main

   implicit none

   integer :: n, a1, a2, answer2, num_odds, i, j, count, sqrt_n, temp_i, current_count

   integer(8) :: sum1, n_second, temp, temp_swap

   integer(8), allocatable :: list(:), odds(:)

   character(len=20) :: str_second, string_a, string_b

   ! Read input

   read*, n

   allocate(list(n))

   read*, list

   ! Process first part

   sum1 = 0

   allocate(odds(n)) ! maximum possible odds is n

   num_odds =0

   do i=1, n

      if (mod(list(i),2) ==1) then

         num_odds = num_odds +1

         odds(num_odds) = list(i)

      else

         sum1 = sum1 + list(i)

      end if

   end do

   ! Sort odds using bubble sort

   do i =1, num_odds-1

      do j =i+1, num_odds

         if (odds(i) > odds(j)) then

            temp_swap = odds(i)

            odds(i) = odds(j)

            odds(j) = temp_swap

         end if

      end do

   end do

   sum1 = sum1 + sum(odds(1:num_odds))

   if (mod(num_odds,2) ==1) then

      sum1 = sum1 - odds(1)

   end if

   ! Process second part

   n_second = sum1

   answer2 =0

   temp = n_second

   sqrt_n = int(sqrt(real(temp)))

   do i=2, sqrt_n

      count =0

      temp_i = temp

      do while (mod(temp_i, i) ==0)

         temp_i = temp_i /i

         count = count +1

      end do

      temp = temp_i

      if (count >0) then

         current_count = count

         j=1

         do while (current_count >=j)

            current_count = current_count -j

            answer2 = answer2 +1

            j = j+1

         end do

      end if

   end do

   ! Check remaining temp

   if (temp >1) then

      answer2 = answer2 +1

   end if

   ! Process third part

   write(str_second, '(i0)') answer2

   str_second = adjustl(str_second)

   string_a = str_second

   a1 =0

   do i=2, len_trim(str_second)

      if (string_a(i:i) == string_a(i-1:i-1)) then

         if (string_a(i:i) == '1') then

            string_a(i:i) = '0'

         else

            string_a(i:i) = '1'

         end if

         a1 = a1 +1

      end if

   end do

   string_b = str_second

   a2 =0

   do i = len_trim(str_second), 2, -1

      if (string_b(i:i) == string_b(i-1:i-1)) then

         if (string_b(i-1:i-1) == '1') then

            string_b(i-1:i-1) = '0'

         else

            string_b(i-1:i-1) = '1'

         end if

         a2 = a2 +1

      end if

   end do

   print*, min(a1, a2)

   deallocate(list, odds)

end program main
